mapper.insert: insert into goodsreview(grComment, userNum, userName, grNum, gdsNum, grTitle, grScore, grDate ) values (#{grComment},#{userNum},#{userName}, grNum, #{gdsNum}, #{grTitle}, #{grScore}, #{grDate} )
mapper.select: select grNum, grDate, grComment, grLike, grIsdelete, gdsNum, grTitle, userNum, userName, grScore, grCount from goodsreview where gdsNum = #{gdsNum} and grIsdelete = 'n'
select round(avg(grScore)) AS grCount from goodsreview where gdsNum = #{gdsNum} and grIsdelete = 'n'
select round(avg(grScore)) AS grCount from goodsreview where grIsdelete = 'n' GROUP BY gdsNum
SELECT COUNT(grNum) AS grCount FROM goodsreview WHERE gdsNum = #{gdsNum} and grIsdelete = 'n'
